item.title: Bet add a quote by Kristan Higgins
item.description: "Dearly beloved," Father Bruce began, "we are gathered here to witness the union of Nick and Harper as they pledge their love an devotion to each other for what we hope is the last time, because I don't know about you people, but I don't think any of us should have to go through this again." -- Kristan Higgins

item.title: Bet add a quote by Cathie Linz
item.description: "you only live once- but if you do it right once is enough." -- Cathie Linz

item.title: Bet add a quote by Cathie Linz
item.description: "A miracle is a single mom who works two jobs to care for her kids and still helps them with their homework at night. A miracle is a child donating all the money in their piggy bank to help victims of Hurricane Katrina. That's where you'll find the hand and face of God." -- Cathie Linz

item.title: Bet add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "I love language, words, and all the lovely, exciting, and heart wrenching things you can do with them. Pick the right ones, put them in the right order, and youâ€™ve created a moment in time where the reader forgets about the late car payment, the dirty dishes, the impending workweek. You have created a state of bliss. Or negligence, depending on your perspective." -- Darynda Jones
